__e: Maybe we should take this dough and get out of here... put this whole stupid place in our rearview.
Besides, you owe me some cash and you will give it to me.
Okay, so I made a little green. You lost a little time. But you still got Dykstra in the bag.
- She came up to me like you said and offered me a bunch of cash to talk behind your back.
You think I wanted this to happen, Eric?
Every cent I have is in this company, and you come up with this...
